title: Hogans Heroes [s1+s4] (1965, war sitcom)
description:
Comedy show.
If you love M.A.S.H or Allo&#039; Allo&#039; this is a must. :)


The inmates of a German World War II prisoner of war camp conduct an espionage and sabotage campaign right under the noses of their warders.


Hogan&#039;s Heroes was a sitcom about allied POW&#039;s held in the fictitious prisoner of war camp - Stalag 13 (somewhere in Germany) - during WW II. It was shown on CBS from 1965-1971 running for 168 episodes. This torrent includes season 1 and 4.
If you have more seasons, please share. Thanks!


IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0058812/
Wiki: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hogan&#039;s_Heroes
Fans: http://www.hogansheroesfanclub.com/


Note;
pilot was broadcasted in black & white, rest is in color.
POW = Prisoners Of War
